section.heading: Supplemental security income program—Enrollment of disabled persons

content.p: Print RCWs > Title 74 > Chapter 74.12 > Section 74.12.361 74.12.350 << 74.12.361 >> 74.12.400 PDF RCW 74.12.361 Supplemental security income program — Enrollment of disabled persons. The department shall actively develop mechanisms for the income assistance program, the medical assistance program, and the community services administration to facilitate the enrollment in the federal supplemental security income program of disabled persons currently part of assistance units receiving temporary assistance for needy families benefits. [ 1997 c 59 s 23 ; 1994 c 299 s 35 .] NOTES: Intent — Finding — Severability — Conflict with federal requirements — 1994 c 299: See notes following RCW 74.12.400 .
